Role of Academia or Industry in Cultivating the Skill

  • Industry is leading towards the improvisation of the configuration management lifecycle more than ever and especially to automate the pipelines considering the recent technological advances and the rapid turn over of the softwares/development life cycles.
  • Academic provides us theoretical and detailed knowledge of the important factors related to Configuration Management. It also provides Projects to learn in a practical approach.
  • Almost every Industry require Management Systems, and working on different task based on this subject improve our skills.
  • Configuration Management is primarily designed to increase productivity with least mistakes.

Tools Supporting the Skill

Most popular tools used for software configuration management are:

1.ServiceNow:
  • It is a cloud based techinical management support tool.
  • Easy Integration with other tools.
  • It also provides an app store of tools from third party service providers.
2.HPSM
  • It is a cloud based SaaS service provided by HP.
  • It offers many features such as incident management, knowledge management etc which are not offered by other platforms.
  • It is an ITSM tool working over ITIL framework by providng an web interface for change management, release management and interaction management.
3.UCMDB
  • It is a service offered by microfocus company.
  • It helps the system administrator to better manage CMS data.
  • It primarily focus on analyzing and controlling of CMS data.
4.Solarwinds configuration monitor
  • Change management is the main focus of this tool and it does more efficiently than other tools.
  • Troubleshooting time is very less compared to other tools.
  • Real-time alerts for deviations in basline.

Skill Self-Assessment (My Skill Score (1 â€“ 10) and Reasons for Self-Assigned Score)

7

The following are the reasons why I gave myself a score of 7:

  • I have 1 year of work experinece as Software Management Support Engineer. For that whole period I worked on HPSM tool which gave me a lot of exposure to software configuration management.
  • I have worked and have deep knowledge on Revision Control Systems like Github, Bitbucket etc.
  • I have proficient knowledge with SCM tools like HPSM and Servicenow.
